Key.English: Sets the distance from players to spawn civilian units
Key.Chinesesimp: 设置与玩家产生平民单位的距离

Key.English: Sets the max number of civilians to spawn at any one time
Key.Chinesesimp: 设置在任何时间产生的平民的最大数量

Key.English: The radius around player in planes to spawn civilians. Set to 0 to disable spawning while in planes
Key.Chinesesimp: 在飞机上，玩家周围的半径可以产生平民。设置为0将禁用在平面内生成

Key.English: The radius around player in helicopters to spawn civilians. Set to 0 to disable spawning while in helicopters
Key.Chinesesimp: 玩家在直升机周围生成平民的半径。设置为0将禁用在直升机中生成

Key.English: How hostile are civilians initially to BLUFOR side
Key.Chinesesimp: 平民最初对BLUFOR的敌意有多大

Key.English: How hostile are civilians initially to OPFOR side
Key.Chinesesimp: 平民最初对OPFOR一方的敌意有多大

Key.English: How hostile are civilians initially to Independent side
Key.Chinesesimp: 平民最初对Independent一方的敌意有多大

Key.English: Only one Civilian Population System module can be used
Key.Chinesesimp: 只能使用一个平民人口系统模块

Key.English: Adds civilian roles of either Eastern (muezzins, town elders) or Western type (priests, politicians)
Key.Chinesesimp: 增加了东方(宣礼员，城镇长老)或西方类型(牧师，政治家)的平民角色

Key.English: Toggle debug mode on the civilian system
Key.Chinesesimp: 切换民用系统的调试模式

Key.English: The radius at which houses are activated to spawn civilians for crowds. Set to 0 to disable crowds.
Key.Chinesesimp: 房屋被激活为人群生成平民的半径。设置为0以禁用人群。

Key.English: The number of civilians spawned per house for crowds
Key.Chinesesimp: 每户人家为人群所产生的平民人数

Key.English: Maximum number of civilians that can be active for all crowds
Key.Chinesesimp: 可以为所有人群活动的最大平民数量

Key.English: Optional: Will improve performance if single default faction is specified. Otherwise faction will be chosen based on civilian clusster faction.
Key.Chinesesimp: 可选:将提高性能，如果单个默认派别指定。否则将根据平民集群阵营选择阵营。

Key.English: Chance that providing Humanitarian Rations and Water to Civilians will decrease sector hostility
Key.Chinesesimp: 向平民提供人道主义口粮和水将减少隔离区敌意的机会
民用人道主义援助限额

Key.English: Maximum number of Humanitarian Rations/Water Bottles a Civilian is allowed to receive
Key.Chinesesimp: 一个平民最多可以得到多少人道主义口粮/水瓶

Key.English: Enter a list of classnames (comma separated) for any custom water items you want used for humanitarian purposes
Key.Chinesesimp: 输入您希望用于人道主义目的的任何自定义水项目的类名列表(逗号分隔)

Key.English: Enter a list of classnames (comma separated) for any custom ration items you want used for humanitarian purposes
Key.Chinesesimp: 输入您想用于人道主义目的的任何定制配给项目的类名列表(逗号分隔)

Key.English: Enable the use of ACEX Humanitarian items instead of the default ALiVE ones
Key.Chinesesimp: 启用ACEX人道物品的使用，而不是默认的生命物品

Key.English: This civilian does not require any more humanitarian aid.
Key.Chinesesimp: 这名平民不需要更多的人道主义援助。

Key.English: You have no humanitarian aid to give to this civilian!
Key.Chinesesimp: 你没有人道主义援助给这个平民!

Key.English: What town do you live in?
Have you seen any IED's lately?
Have you seen any insurgent activity lately?
Key.Chinesesimp: 你最近看到叛乱活动了吗？

Key.English: Do you know the location of any insurgent hideouts?
Key.Spanish: ¿Conoces la ubicación de algún escondite insurgente?
Key.Chinesesimp: 你知道叛乱分子藏身处的位置吗？

Key.English: Have you seen any strange behavior lately?
Key.Chinesesimp: 你最近有没有看到什么奇怪的行为？

Key.English: What is the opinion of our forces in this area?
Key.Spanish: ¿Cuál es la opinión de nuestras fuerzas en esta área?
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们在这个地区的部队有什么看法？

Key.Spanish: *%1 parece no tener interés en la conversación*

Key.English: I do not want to talk to you anymore.
Key.Spanish: Ya no quiero seguir hablando contigo.

Key.English: getting ready to bomb your forces
Key.Spanish: alistándose para explotar encima de tus fuerzas
apunto de hacer un atentado explosivo contra tus fuerzas

Key.English: planning on carrying out a suicide bombing
Key.Spanish: planeando en llevar a cabo un atentado explosivo suicida

Key.English: getting ready to bomb your forces
Key.Spanish: preparándose para explotar encima de tus fuerzas
apunto de hacer un atentado explosivo contra tus fuerzas

Key.English: storing a weapon in his house
Key.Spanish: manteniendo un arma en su casa
planeando en disparar a una patrulla

Key.English: looking for patrols to shoot at
Key.Chinesesimp: 寻找可以射击的巡逻队

Key.English: paid to shoot at your forces
Key.Spanish: recibiendo dinero para disparar a tus fuerzas

Key.English: storing a weapon in his house
Key.Spanish: manteniendo un arma en su casa
planeando en disparar a una patrulla

Key.English: looking for patrols to shoot at
Key.Chinesesimp: 寻找可以射击的巡逻队

Key.English: paid to shoot at your forces
Key.Spanish: recibiendo dinero para disparar a tus fuerzas
plantando explosivos en los al rededores

Key.English: paid to shoot at your forces
Key.Spanish: recibiendo dinero para disparar a tus fuerzas

Key.English: retrieving weapons from a nearby weapons depot
Key.Spanish: consiguiendo armas desde un depósito de armamento cercano
Key.Chinesesimp: 从附近的武器库取回武器

Key.Spanish: planeando en unirse a los insurgentes

Key.English: getting ready to go to a nearby insurgent recruitment center
Key.Spanish: preparándose para ir a un centro de reclutamiento insurgente cercano
Key.Chinesesimp: 准备前往附近的叛乱分子招募中心

Key.English: getting ready to retrieve weapons from a cache
Key.Spanish: preparándose para conseguir armas desde un depósito
Key.Chinesesimp: 准备从藏匿处取回武器

Key.Spanish: recibiendo dinero para atacar a tus fuerzas
forzado a unirse a los insurgentes
preparándose para atacar a tus fuerzas
No te lo voy a decir de nuevo.

Key.Chinesesimp: 我们不是已经讨论过了吗？

Key.English: Why are you asking me again.
Key.Spanish: Y... ¿Por qué me preguntas lo mismo?

Key.English: You are beginning to annoy me with that question.
Key.Spanish: Estás comenzando a aburrirme con esa pregunta
Key.Chinesesimp: 你开始用那个问题来烦我了。

Key.English: I cannot talk about this anymore.
Key.Spanish: Ya no puedo seguir hablando de eso.

Key.English: You have gotten your answers already.
Key.Spanish: Ya tienes tu respuesta sobre eso.

Key.English: I live over there, I'll show you (%1's house has been marked on the map).
Key.Spanish: Vivo por allá, te mostraré. (La casa de %1 se ha marcado en el mapa)
Key.Chinesesimp: 我住在那边，我带你去看看（地图上已经标出了%1的房子）。

Key.English: I live nearby (%1's house has been marked on the map).
Key.Spanish: Vivo por aquí (La casa de %1 se ha marcado en el mapa)
Key.Chinesesimp: 我住在附近（地图上已标记%1的房子）。

Key.English: I will point it out for you (%1's house has been marked on the map).
Key.Spanish: Deja, te lo apunto. (La casa de %1 se ha marcado en el mapa).
Key.Chinesesimp: 我会为你指出（%1的房子已经在地图上标出）。

Key.English: I live right over there (%1's house has been marked on the map).
Key.Spanish: Vivo justo por allá. (La casa de %1 se ha marcado en el mapa).
Key.Chinesesimp: 我就住在那里（%1的房子已在地图上标出）。

Key.English: Just over there. (The house is marked on the map).
Key.Spanish: Allí nada más. (La casa de %1 se ha marcado en el mapa).
Key.Chinesesimp: 就在那边。（房子在地图上有标记）。

Key.English: I am sorry, but I don't feel comfortable giving that information out.
Key.Spanish: Lo siento mucho, pero no me siento cómodo dando esa información.
Key.Chinesesimp: 很抱歉，但我不太愿意透露这些信息。

Key.English: I do not want to share that with you.
I do not owe you anything.
I live in the village of %1.
They would not like me talking to you.
Key.Spanish: A ellos no les gustaría que hable con ustedes.

Key.English: I am sorry, but I do not feel comfortable giving that information out.
Key.Spanish: Lo siento, pero no me siento cómodo entregando esa información.
Key.Chinesesimp: 很抱歉，但我不太愿意透露这些信息。

Key.English: Sorry, I do not want to answer that.
Key.Spanish: Lo siento, pero no quiero contestar eso.
Key.Chinesesimp: 对不起，我不想回答这个问题。

Key.English: I should not share that with you
I just want to be left alone.
Key.Spanish: Sólo quiero que me dejen tranquilo.
Por favor, deja a mi gente tranquila.

Key.English: I am sorry, but I do not feel comfortable giving that information out.
Key.Spanish: Lo siento, pero no me siento cómodo entregando esa información.
Key.Chinesesimp: 很抱歉，但我不太愿意透露这些信息。

Key.English: I should not share that with you.
Key.Spanish: No debería compartir esa información contigo.

Key.English: I do not owe you anything.
Key.Spanish: No tengo por qué contestar eso.

Key.English: I will not tell you where I live!
Key.Chinesesimp: 我不会告诉你我住在哪里！

Key.English: You will not terrorize my town!
Key.Spanish: ¡No dejaré que aterroricen a mi pueblo!
Lo siento, no he visto ninguno.

Key.English: Not that I know of, sorry.
Key.Spanish: No que yo sepa, lo siento.

Key.English: No IEDs have been set near here.
Key.Spanish: No se han puesto IED's por esta zona.
No te lo diría ni muerto.

Key.English: You will have to find that out for yourself.

Key.Spanish: Yo que tú, camino con cuidado.

Key.English: Maybe I should have planted a few.
Key.Spanish: Y quizás debería salir a plantar un par.

Key.English: Yes I saw one earlier (Location marked on map).
Key.Spanish: Sí, vi uno temprano hoy (Ubicación marcada en el mapa).
Key.Chinesesimp: 是的，我之前看到过一个（地图上标明了位置）。

Key.English: Let me show you one (Location marked on map).
Key.Spanish: Deja que te muestre donde vi uno (Ubicación marcada en el mapa).
Key.Chinesesimp: 让我给你看一个（地图上标明的位置）。

Key.English: I think I know a spot (Location marked on map).
Key.Spanish: Creo recordar un punto (Ubicación marcada en el mapa).
Key.Chinesesimp: 我想我知道一个地点（地图上标明的位置）。

Key.English: I saw an insurgent plant one (Location marked on map).
Key.Spanish: Vi a un insurgente plantando uno aquí (Ubicación marcada en el mapa).
Key.Chinesesimp: 我看到一个叛乱工厂（地图上标明了位置）。

Key.Spanish: Lo siento, pero no tengo idea.

Key.English: I cannot give that type of information out.
Key.Spanish: No puedo entregar ese tipo de información.

Key.English: I would be killed if I told you.
Key.Spanish: Me matarían si te lo dijera.
Key.Chinesesimp: 如果我告诉你我会被杀的。

Key.English: Please leave, they can't see me talking to you.
Key.Spanish: Por favor váyanse, no quiero que me vean hablando con ustedes.
Key.Chinesesimp: 请离开，他们看不到我在和你说话。

Key.English: Sorry I have not seen any.
Key.Spanish: Lo siento, no he visto a ninguno.
No, no hay ninguno por estos lados.
No he visto ninguno estos días.

Key.English: Don't snitch on me (Insurgents marked on map).
Key.Spanish: No le digas a nadie que te he dicho (Insurgentes marcados en el mapa)
Key.Chinesesimp: 别向我告密（地图上标明叛乱分子）。

Key.English: Yes, let me show you where I saw them (Insurgents marked on map).
Key.Spanish: Sí, déjame que te muestre dónde los vi (Insurgentes marcados en el mapa)
Key.Chinesesimp: 是的，让我告诉你们我在哪里看到他们（在地图上标出叛乱分子）。

Key.English: Yes, but you must keep this secret (Insurgents marked on map).
Key.Spanish: Sí, pero debes mantener en secreto quién te dijo (Insurgentes marcados en el mapa)
Key.Chinesesimp: 是的，但你们必须保守这个秘密。

Key.English: I don't want to talk about this.
I don't want to talk to you.
They wouldn't like me talking to you.
Key.Spanish: A ellos no les gustaría que hable con ustedes.
Key.Chinesesimp: 他们不喜欢我和你说话。

Key.English: As if I would tell you.
Key.Spanish: Como si te lo fuese a decir.

Key.English: I don't want to talk about this.
I don't want to talk to you.
They wouldn't want me talking to you.
Key.Spanish: Ellos no querrían verme hablando con ustedes.
Key.Chinesesimp: 他们不想让我和你说话。

Key.English: You can't ask questions like that.
Key.Spanish: No puedes preguntar ese tipo de cosas.

Key.English: I don't want to talk about this.
Key.Spanish: No quiero hablar con ustedes sobre eso.

Key.English: I don't want to talk to you.
As if I would tell you.
Key.Spanish: Como si te lo fuese a decir.

Key.English: I don't want to talk about this.
I don't want to talk to you.
Insurgents have not established any installations here.
Key.Spanish: Los insurgentes no tienen ninguna instalación aquí.
Key.Chinesesimp: 叛乱分子没有在这里建立任何设施。

Key.English: There are no insurgent bases here.
Key.Spanish: No hay bases insurgentes por aquí.

Key.English: There are no insurgent hideouts here.
Key.Spanish: No hay escondites insurgentes por aquí.
Key.Chinesesimp: 这里没有叛乱分子的藏身之处。

Key.English: Insurgents have not taken over this area yet.
Key.Spanish: Los insurgentes no se han tomado esta área aún.
Key.Chinesesimp: 叛乱分子尚未占领这一地区。

Key.English: We are still free from their reign.
Key.Spanish: Aún no han llegado a mandar aquí.
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们仍然摆脱了他们的统治。

Key.English: Do you want to get me killed?
I will not put myself in danger.
Key.Spanish: No me voy a poner en peligro a mí mismo.
Key.Chinesesimp: 我不会把自己置于危险之中。

Key.English: I cannot put my family at risk by answering that.
Key.Spanish: No puedo arriesgar a mi familiar respondiendo eso.
Key.Chinesesimp: 我不能通过回答这个问题来让我的家人处于危险之中

Key.English: I don't have time for this.
I cannot talk about this right now.
Key.Spanish: No puedo hablar sobre eso ahora mismo.

Key.English: Why would you ask me such question.
Key.Chinesesimp: 你为什么要问我这样的问题。

Key.English: That is a crazy question to ask.
Key.Spanish: Esa es una pregunta muy idiota.
Key.Chinesesimp: 这个问题问起来很疯狂。

Key.English: Do you want to get me killed?
I will not put myself in danger.
Key.Spanish: No me voy a poner en peligro a mí mismo.
Key.Chinesesimp: 我不会把自己置于危险之中。

Key.English: I cannot help you with that.
Key.Spanish: No te puedo ayudar con eso.

Key.English: I noticed a %1 nearby (%2 marked on map).
Key.Spanish: Noté que hay un %1 cerca (%2 marcado en el mapa).
Key.Chinesesimp: 我注意到附近有一个%1（地图上标记了%2）。

Key.English: Someone told me there was a %1 close by (%2 marked on map).
Key.Spanish: Alguien me dijo que hay un %1 por acá cerca (%2 marcado en el mapa).
Key.Chinesesimp: 有人告诉我附近有一个%1（地图上标记了%2）。

Key.English: I observed insurgents setting up a %1 (%2 marked on map).
Key.Spanish: Vi insurgentes instalando un %1 (%2 marcado en el mapa).
Key.Chinesesimp: 我观察到叛乱分子设置了一个%1（地图上标记了%2）

Key.English: I know the location of a %1 (%2 marked on map).
Key.Spanish: Conozco la ubicación de un %1 (%2 marcado en el mapa).
Key.Chinesesimp: 我知道%1的位置（地图上标记了%2）。

Key.English: Insurgents established a %1 (%2 marked on map).
Key.Spanish: Insurgentes establecieron un %1 (%2 marcado en el mapa).
Key.Chinesesimp: 叛乱分子建立了一个%1（地图上标记了%2）。

Key.English: I can show you the location of a %1 (%2 marked on map).
Key.Spanish: Puedo mostrarte la ubicación de un %1 (%2 marcado en el mapa).
Key.Chinesesimp: 我可以向您显示%1的位置（地图上标记了%2）。

Key.English: You must keep this a secret (%2 marked on map).
Key.Spanish: Tienes que mantener el secreto, si (%2 marcado en el mapa).
Key.Chinesesimp: 您必须对此保密（地图上标记了%2）。

Key.English: You must promise to protect me (%2 marked on map).
Key.Spanish: Tienen que prometer que me protegerán (%2 marcado en el mapa).
Key.Chinesesimp: 你必须保证保护我（地图上标记了%2）。

Key.English: Please remove the %1 from the area and restore peace (%2 marked on map).
Key.Spanish: Por favor eliminen el %1 del área y devuélvannos la paz (%2 marcado en el mapa).
Key.Chinesesimp: 请从区域中删除%1并恢复和平（地图上标记了%2）。

Key.English: Someone told me there was a %1 close by.
Key.Spanish: Alguien me dijo que hay un %1 cerca.
Key.Chinesesimp: 有人告诉我附近有一个%1。

Key.English: I observed insurgents setting up a %1.
Key.Chinesesimp: 我注意到叛乱分子在设置%1。

Key.Spanish: Los insurgentes han preparado un %1 cerca.
Key.Chinesesimp: 叛乱分子在附近准备了%1。

Key.English: Insurgents established a %1 close by here.
Key.Chinesesimp: 叛乱分子在附近建立了%1。

Key.English: Others have mentioned a %1 close by.
Key.Spanish: Hay rumores de un %1 por aquí.
Key.Chinesesimp: 其他人在附近提到了一个%1。

Key.Spanish: Los insurgentes instalaron un %1 cerca de aquí.
Key.Chinesesimp: 叛乱分子在附近设置了一个%1。

Key.English: Restore peace to this area, there is a %1 around here.
Key.Spanish: Traigan paz a esta área. Hay un %1 en alguna parte.
Key.Chinesesimp: 恢复此区域的和平，这附近有一个%1。

Key.English: I do not know where it is, but insurgents are operating a %1 somewhere around here.
Key.Spanish: No estoy seguro dónde, pero los insurgentes tienen un %1 por aquí en algún lugar.
Key.Chinesesimp: 我不知道它在哪里，但叛乱分子正在附近某处操作一个%1。

Key.English: Do you want to get me killed.
I cannot put my family at risk by answering that.
Key.Spanish: No puedo poner a mi familia en riesgo contestando eso.
Key.Chinesesimp: 我不能通过回答这个问题来让我的家人处于危险之中。

Key.English: There has been no suspicious behavior lately.
Key.Spanish: No ha habido ningún comportamiento sospechoso últimamente.

Key.Chinesesimp: 我们是一个和平的社区。

Key.English: I will not put myself at risk.
Key.Spanish: No me voy a arriesgar por ustedes.
Key.Chinesesimp: 我不会让自己处于危险之中。

Key.English: They would kill me if I told you.
Key.Spanish: Me matarían si te dijera algo.
Key.Chinesesimp: 如果我告诉你，他们会杀了我。

Key.English: There has been no suspicious behavior lately.
Key.Spanish: No ha habido ningún comportamiento sospechoso últimamente.

Key.English: They wouldn't want me talking to you.
Key.Spanish: Ellos no querrían que yo hable con ustedes.
Key.Chinesesimp: 他们不想让我和你说话。

Key.English: I shouldn't be talking about this.
Key.Spanish: No debería hablar de eso con ustedes.

Key.English: They wouldn't want me talking to you.
Key.Spanish: Ellos no querrían que yo hable con ustedes.
Key.Chinesesimp: 他们不想让我和你说话。

Key.English: I have not seen anything lately.
I don't have time for this.
I overheard where he was (Position marked on map).
Key.Spanish: Escuche dónde andaba (Posición marcada en el mapa).
Key.Chinesesimp: 我无意中听到他在哪里（地图上标明的位置）。

Key.English: Someone told me where he was (Position marked on map).
Key.Spanish: Alguien me dijo dónde andaba (Posición marcada en el mapa).
Key.Chinesesimp: 有人告诉我他在哪里（地图上标明的位置）。

Key.English: I saw him earlier (Position marked on map).
Key.Spanish: Lo ví hoy temprano (Posición marcada en el mapa).
Key.Chinesesimp: 我早些时候见过他（地图上标明的位置）。

Key.English: I I think I know where you can find him (Position marked on map).
Key.Spanish: Creo que sé dónde le pueden encontrar (Posición marcada en el mapa).
Key.Chinesesimp: 我想我知道你在哪里可以找到他（地图上标明的位置）。

Key.English: I'll show you where he lives (Home marked on map).
Key.Spanish: Te mostraré dónde vive (Casa marcada en el mapa).
Key.Chinesesimp: 我会告诉你他住在哪里（地图上标明了家）。

Key.English: I know where he lives (Home marked on map).
Key.Spanish: Sé dónde vive (Casa marcada en el mapa).
Key.Chinesesimp: 我知道他住在哪里（地图上标明了家

Key.English: Someone told me where he lives (Home marked on map).
Key.Spanish: Alguien me dijo dónde vive (Casa marcada en el mapa).
Key.Chinesesimp: 有人告诉我他住在哪里（地图上标明了家）。

Key.English: I will show you where you can find him (Home marked on map).
Key.Spanish: Te mostraré dónde lo pueden encontrar (Casa marcada en el mapa).
Key.Chinesesimp: 我会告诉你在哪里可以找到他（地图上标明了家）。

Key.English: They wouldn't like me talking to you.
Key.Spanish: Ellos no querrían que hable con ustedes.
Key.Chinesesimp: 他们不喜欢我和你说话。

Key.English: Please leave before they see you.
Key.Spanish: Por favor, váyanse antes de que los vean.
Key.Chinesesimp: 请在他们见到你之前离开。

Key.English: They must not see me talking to you.
Key.Spanish: No puedo dejar que me vean hablando con ustedes.
Key.Chinesesimp: 他们一定不要看到我和你说话。

Key.English: You will have no problems with me.
Key.Spanish: Por mi parte, no tendrán problemas.

Key.English: You do not have to worry about me.
Key.Spanish: No hay por qué preocuparse por mí.
Doy todo mi apoyo a sus fuerzas.
Key.Chinesesimp: 我完全支持你们的部队。

Key.Spanish: Les apoyo, la mayoría del tiempo.

Key.English: I support you. Do not mess it up.
Key.Spanish: Les apoyo, nada más no la caguen.
Key.Chinesesimp: 我支持你。不要把它搞砸了。

Key.English: I have mixed feelings about your forces.
Key.Chinesesimp: 我对你们的部队有复杂的感觉。
你一直保持着我的信任。

Key.English: I have supported you for awhile.
Key.Spanish: Les vengo apoyando hace un tiempo.
Key.Chinesesimp: 我支持你已经有一段时间了。

Key.English: Your forces have made bad decisions lately.
Key.Spanish: Sus fuerzas han tomado algunas malas decisiones últimamente.
Key.Chinesesimp: 你的部队最近做出了错误的决定。

Key.English: I am beginning to dislike you.
Key.Spanish: Estoy comenzando a perder simpatía por ustedes.

Key.Chinesesimp: 你必须重新获得我的信任。

Key.Spanish: Preferiría que no se queden por mucho tiempo aquí.

Key.English: I strongly oppose of your presence here.
Key.Spanish: Me opongo rotundamente a su presencia aquí.

Key.English: I am extremely opposed to you.
Key.Spanish: Estoy absolutamente en contra de ustedes.
No veo la hora de que se vayan.

Key.English: Who would support people like you?
Key.Spanish: ¿Quién podría darle apoyo a tipos como ustedes?
Key.Chinesesimp: 谁会支持像你这样的人？

Key.English: I don't want to talk right now.
I don't think I should be talking to you.
Key.Spanish: Creo que no debería estar hablando con ustedes.
Key.Chinesesimp: 我想我不应该和你说话。

Key.English: I shouldn't be talking to you.
They wouldn't like me talking to you.
Key.Spanish: Ellos no querrían que esté hablando con ustedes
Key.Chinesesimp: 他们不喜欢我和你说话。

Key.English: You must leave this place immediately.
Key.Chinesesimp: 你必须立即离开这个地方。

Key.English: You are in severe danger here.
Please leave before they see you.
Key.Spanish: Por favor, váyanse antes de que los vean.
Key.Chinesesimp: 请在他们见到你之前离开。

Key.English: They must not see me talking to you.
Key.Spanish: No puedo dejar que me vean hablando con ustedes.
Key.Chinesesimp: 他们一定不要看到我和你说话。

Key.English: You are well respected around here.
I don't think you need to worry about our hostility here.
Key.Spanish: No creo que tengan nada de qué preocuparse en este pueblo.
Key.Chinesesimp: 我认为你不必担心我们在这里的敌意。

Key.English: We will help you if we can.
Key.Spanish: Les ayudaremos en lo que podamos.
Key.Chinesesimp: 如果可以的话，我们会帮助你的。

Key.Spanish: La tensión está al alza últimamente.
Key.Chinesesimp: 最近紧张局势不断加剧。

Key.English: The people around here are undecided.
Key.Chinesesimp: 这附近的人还没有决定。

Key.English: There are mixed feelings about you.
You might want to try and lower hostility around here.
Key.Spanish: Puede que quieran bajar la hostilidad en esta zona.
Key.Chinesesimp: 你可能想尝试降低这里的敌意。

Key.Spanish: La mayoría de nosotros les apoyamos.
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们大多数人都支持你。

Key.Spanish: La tensión aquí ha aumentado bastante.

Key.English: The people around here do not like you.
Key.Spanish: No les agradan a la gente de aquí.

Key.English: You are not liked around here.
Key.Spanish: No son del agrado de la gente de por acá.

Key.English: Most people do not support you.
Key.Spanish: La mayoría de la gente no les da apoyo.
La tensión aquí es muy alta.

Key.English: Be very careful of people around here.
Key.Spanish: Sean muy cuidadosos con la gente de por aquí.
Hay una oposición férrea a ustedes aquí.

Key.English: Very few of us support you.
Key.Spanish: Muy pocos de nosotros les apoyamos.
La tensión aquí es extremadamente alta.

Key.English: You might get followed if you stick around.
Key.Spanish: Puede que los sigan si se quedan mucho tiempo aquí.
Key.Chinesesimp: 如果你留下来，可能会被跟踪。

Key.Spanish: La gente de aquí los odia.

Key.Chinesesimp: 这里几乎没有人支持你。
